pullRequest.title: Resolve conflicts
pullRequest.bodyText:
Before creating a pull request make sure that:

 commit messages are meaningful and follow good commit message guidelines
 README and other documentation has been updated / added (if needed)
 tests have been updated / new tests has been added (if needed)

Please remove this line and everything above and fill the following sections:
JIRA link (if applicable)
https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-10390
Change description
Does this PR introduce a breaking change? (check one with "x")
[ ] Yes
[X] No

commit.message:
Rdm 9052 (#1155)

* upgraded spring boot to 2.3.4

* error message update

* updated the preconditions

* RDM-9480 Fix All Temporarily Suppressed CVEs - Hazelcast code change.
Includes Liquibase changes from RDM-9052

* updated charts

* updated format

* swagger update

* spring fox ui update

* RDM-9052: Swagger config upgraded to springfox 3.0.0

* RDM-9052: Swagger config upgraded to springfox 3.0.0
Removed AliasWebConfig as it is not needed

* update for swagger-ui whitelist

* updated precondition for liquibase

* RDM-9480 Fix All Temporarily Suppressed CVEs - Data Store Api

Co-authored-by: Sita <sita.kandala@hmcts.net>
Co-authored-by: MSancaktutar <mutlu.sancaktutar@hmcts.net>
Co-authored-by: kiran.yenigala@hmcts.net <Yrlks1091327~>
Co-authored-by: Ashley Noronha <ashleydeannoronha@gmail.com>

Rdm 9052 (#1184)

* upgraded spring boot to 2.3.4

* RDM-9480 Fix All Temporarily Suppressed CVEs - Hazelcast code change.
Includes Liquibase changes from RDM-9052

* swagger update

* spring fox ui update

* RDM-9052: Swagger config upgraded to springfox 3.0.0

* RDM-9052: Swagger config upgraded to springfox 3.0.0
Removed AliasWebConfig as it is not needed

* update for swagger-ui whitelist

* updated precondition for liquibase

* RDM-9480 Fix All Temporarily Suppressed CVEs - Data Store Api

* reverted liquibase changes and upated liquibase version to 3.10.3

* suppressed CVE-2020-13943

* deleted the change log for rdm-9052

* remove es smoke test

* temp suppression

* remove ES test from smoke test

* disable es test run on preview

* revert change

Co-authored-by: Sita <sita.kandala@hmcts.net>
Co-authored-by: MSancaktutar <mutlu.sancaktutar@hmcts.net>
Co-authored-by: kiran.yenigala@hmcts.net <Yrlks1091327~>
Co-authored-by: Ashley Noronha <ashleydeannoronha@gmail.com>
remove ReadinessHealthIndicator.java as it is nolonger needed after spring boot upgrade
removed sonar issues in the class

Release cut demo deployment fix (#1231)

* Update liquibase.gradle

* Update dependency-check-suppressions.xml

* Update liquibase.gradle (#1228)

* Update gssEncMode  (#1230)

* Update values.yaml

* Update liquibase.gradle

* Update values.yaml

* removed gssmode, it will be governed by env variable..

* reverted the change gssEncMode

* enable forward for status health

Co-authored-by: Hemanth <hrpotipati@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: henryk <kornelee.henry@hmcts.net>
logging for calls to IdamRepo to distinguish api fetches & cache hits

Merge pull request #1240 from hmcts/add_log_for_user_info

log retrieved user info from idam

Merge pull request #1216 from hmcts/release-cut-20.2.0

Release cut 20.2.0

Merge branch 'master' into develop

# Conflicts:
#	build.gradle
#	charts/ccd-data-store-api/values.preview.template.yaml
#	dependency-check-suppressions.xml
#	liquibase.gradle
#	src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/ccd/AliasWebConfig.java
#	src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/ccd/SecurityConfiguration.java

bump up charts revision to 3.4.4 to match master

nodes.bodyText: Doesn't look right that we're downgrading? 🤔
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -2,13 +2,13 @@ description: Helm chart for the HMCTS CCD Data Store
 name: ccd-data-store-api
 apiVersion: v2
 home: https://github.com/hmcts/ccd-data-store-api
-version: 1.7.2
+version: 1.7.3
 maintainers:
   - name: HMCTS CCD Dev Team
     email: ccd-devops@HMCTS.NET
 dependencies:
   - name: java
-    version: 3.4.4
+    version: 3.4.2

nodes.bodyText: we are already logging in idamRepository, it is not needed again here... it will log the same info multiple times
we are already logging in idamRepository, it is not needed again here... it will log the same info multiple times
can we use ParameterType.HEADER("header"), instead of hard coding "header"
can we use ParameterType.HEADER("header"), instead of hard coding "header"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -92,7 +97,8 @@ private RequestParameter headerServiceAuthorization() {
         return new RequestParameterBuilder()
             .name("ServiceAuthorization")
             .description("Valid Service-to-Service JWT token for a whitelisted micro-service")
-            .in(ParameterType.HEADER)
+            .in("header")
+            .accepts(Collections.singleton(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON))

nodes.bodyText: if we are forwarding the request to "/health" do we need to add this in "SecurityConfiguration --> AUTH_WHITELIST"
